column5: I am headed up the end of Oct. It should be nice and cold by then. I was wondering how much lower the water levels are compared to last year. How high is the water over top the reefs out by the big rock pile in the bay? How much of the reef is showing and how is the fishing going?Thanks,
Not sure where you are talking about but I have heard that the water at Minaki/Big Sand is low and the fishing is very slow. The water has made a drastic decline since June's high water problems.
